biotools.summary: IMGT/DomainGapAlign is the IMGT® tool for the analysis of amino acid sequences of variable (V), constant (C) or groove (G) domains. Analysis is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT DomainGapAlign
